duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide 3rd tier problem resolution and technical support for assigned multi-tiered and major business applications.
Serve as the Subject Matter Expert for company supported applications and highly complex systems.
Collaborate with firm leadership for custom reporting needs and setting standards for software applications.
Participate in projects for new software implementation and upgrades, ensuring inter-dependency with other systems.
Monitor tickets and participate in quality assurance testing for compatibility issues and continuity of knowledge base.
Provide technical guidance to other support teams in the IT Department, including the Service Desk and Desktop Support.
Participate in the development and management of software requests and updates.
Maintain documentation and standards, including all pertinent IT Service Catalog entries.
Proactively monitor latest legal software development and participate in the management of software requests and updates.
Provide dependable and consistent on-call support as needed for backup where special expertise is required.
Assist with problem resolutions, provide backup for coverage, and assist others with skill development.
Participate in projects for new software implementation and upgrades.
Read, analyze, interpret, and write reports, business correspondence, and procedure manuals.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science, MIS, or equivalent work experience
